content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services. I'm here to help schedule your plumbing service. Could you please tell me your full name?
Thanks, Emily! Could you please provide your address so I can check our service availability and schedule your appointment?
It's just 123 Main. Sorry, I don’t have the rest right now.
I’m sorry, Emily, but the address seems incomplete. Could you please provide the full address, including street, city, and zip code, so I can make sure we're servicing your area?
I really don't know the rest. Can you just send someone?

I understand, Emily, but we need the complete address to confirm that your location is within our service area and to ensure the technician can find you. Unfortunately, without the full address, I’m unable to proceed with scheduling the appointment.
